General.Name: Omega Diagnostics Group Plc
General.Description: Omega Diagnostics Group PLC, through its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and distributes medical diagnostics products for the food sensitivity testing market in the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, North America, South/Central America, India, other Asian countries and the Far East, Africa, and the Middle East. The company is involved in the research, development, and production of kits for detection of immune reactions to food under the Foodprint name. It provides clinical analysis to the general public, clinics, and health professionals, as well as supplies Food Detective, a consumer food test. The company serves government, private hospitals, reference laboratories, nutritionists, naturopaths, and other healthcare professionals. It markets its products approximately in 85 countries worldwide. Omega Diagnostics Group PLC was founded in 1987 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Omega House, Alva, United Kingdom, FK12 5DQ
